product_overview: RecipeRec is a web-based application that uses AI to provide personalized recipe recommendations based on user preferences, available ingredients, and dietary needs. It enables users to discover, save, and manage recipes efficiently to support meal planning and reduce food waste.
core_goals: Provide personalized and AI-driven recipe recommendations tailored to individual user preferences.
Allow users to search and browse recipes by ingredients, categories, and cuisines.
Enable users to save favorite recipes and plan meals effectively.
Support multiple languages through internationalization features.
Ensure a fast, responsive, and secure application experience suitable for a growing user base.
key_features: User Authentication and Management through Supabase integration.
Customizable Dietary and Cuisine Preferences including ingredient exclusions.
AI-Powered Recipe Generation using Large Language Models to create personalized recipes.
Search and Browse functionality by ingredients and recipe categories such as meal type.
Detailed Recipe Views showing ingredients, instructions, cooking times, and nutritional info.
Favorites Management allowing users to save and retrieve their preferred recipes.
Internationalization support with multiple languages and dynamic text translation.
Theme Switching between light and dark modes for improved usability.
Backend services utilizing Express.js and SQLite for data management and API routing.
In-memory caching for improved performance of frequent queries.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Welcome Page and can navigate through the application via the main menu.
User signs up or logs in to access personalized features.
User sets dietary, cuisine, and ingredient preferences through the preferences settings.
User creates or searches for meals via the AI-powered Create Meal Component by entering available ingredients or criteria.
Generated recipes are displayed in the Results List Component for user browsing.
User selects a recipe to view detailed information in the Recipe Detail Component.
User saves recipes to their Favorites list and can view/manage favorites in a dedicated Favorites Page.
Users can switch application themes and languages dynamically via settings.
User interacts with backend APIs for recipe generation, favorites management, and translation services.
validation_criteria: User authentication and preference storage function correctly and securely.
AI recipe generation returns relevant and customized recipe results based on user input.
Favorites feature correctly saves and retrieves user favorite recipes both locally and via backend.
Application supports multiple languages and translations render correctly.
Theme toggling between light/dark modes works smoothly across all components.
Performance benchmarks meet responsiveness standards under typical user load.
All API endpoints respond correctly and handle errors gracefully.
UI components follow usability guidelines and adapt correctly on desktop and mobile screens.
